trans-unit.source: Defines a set of members for derived classes to provide options for the masked text box UI type editor.
trans-unit.target: 定義一組衍生類別的成員提供遮罩的文字方塊方塊的 UI 類型編輯器的選項。

trans-unit.source: The MaskDescriptor abstract class defines the common set of properties that all mask descriptors must implement.
trans-unit.target: MaskDescriptor 抽象類別會定義一組常用的屬性都必須實作所有的遮罩描述項。

trans-unit.source: You can use mask descriptors to create predefined mask options for use in the UI type editor for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用遮罩描述項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>的型別編輯器建立 UI 中使用的預先定義的遮罩選項

trans-unit.source: For example, [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)] provides predefined masks for data such as the Postal Code, time, different date formats, and telephone number.
trans-unit.target: 例如，[!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)]提供預先定義的遮罩的資料，例如郵遞區號、 時間、 不同的日期格式和電話號碼。

trans-unit.source: All predefined masks will be associated with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider> parsing engine.
trans-unit.target: 所有預先定義的遮罩，會與相關聯<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider>剖析引擎。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider>

trans-unit.source: You can discover MaskDescriptor types at design time by querying the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDiscoveryService> service provider.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在設計階段探索的 MaskDescriptor 類型，藉由查詢<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDiscoveryService>服務提供者。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDiscoveryService>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.MaskDescriptor"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.MaskDescriptor"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: MaskDescriptor is a compiler-supplied default constructor.
trans-unit.target: MaskDescriptor 為編譯器提供的預設建構函式。

trans-unit.source: A default constructor is required by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDiscoveryService> service provider.
trans-unit.target: 預設建構函式所需的<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDiscoveryService>服務提供者。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDiscoveryService>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> representing the locale the mask is authored for.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>表示遮罩的地區設定是撰寫的 for...in</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> representing the locale the mask is authored for.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>表示地區設定遮罩是撰寫的 for...in</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.MaskDescriptor"></xref> is equal to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.MaskDescriptor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否指定<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.MaskDescriptor"></xref>是否等於目前<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.MaskDescriptor"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The Equals method determines whether `maskDescriptor` and the current mask descriptor describe the same mask.
trans-unit.target: Equals 方法會判斷是否`maskDescriptor`和目前的遮罩描述項描述相同的遮罩。

trans-unit.source: This method returns `true` if the following conditions are met in both mask descriptors.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回`true`如果符合下列條件中這兩個遮罩描述項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MaskDescriptor.Mask%2A> property is the same for both mask descriptors.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MaskDescriptor.Mask%2A>屬性是一樣的同時加上遮罩描述元。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MaskDescriptor.Mask%2A>

trans-unit.source: The validating type is the same for both mask descriptors.
trans-unit.target: 驗證的型別是相同的兩個遮罩描述項。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MaskDescriptor.Name%2A> property is not considered, because the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> classes do not use it.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] ><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MaskDescriptor.Name%2A>屬性不是，因為<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>類別不會使用它。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MaskDescriptor.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.MaskDescriptor"></xref> to compare with the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.MaskDescriptor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.MaskDescriptor"> </xref>要與目前比較<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.MaskDescriptor"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.MaskDescriptor"></xref> is equal to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.MaskDescriptor"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.MaskDescriptor"></xref>是否等於目前<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Design.MaskDescriptor"> </xref>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for a particular type.
trans-unit.target: 可做為特定類型的雜湊函式。

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: 目前<xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>雜湊程式碼

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the specified mask descriptor is valid and can be added to the masks list.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出指定的遮罩描述元是否有效，而且可以新增至遮罩清單。

trans-unit.source: The IsValidMaskDescriptor method determines whether `maskDescriptor` is valid and can be added to the masks list.
trans-unit.target: IsValidMaskDescriptor 方法會判斷是否`maskDescriptor`有效，而且可以新增至遮罩清單。

trans-unit.source: A valid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MaskDescriptor> must meet the following conditions.
trans-unit.target: 有效<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MaskDescriptor>必須符合下列條件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MaskDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: - Not `null`.
trans-unit.target: - Not `null`.

trans-unit.source: - Not `null` or an empty mask.
trans-unit.target: -不`null`或空的遮罩。

trans-unit.source: - Not `null` or an empty name.
trans-unit.target: -不`null`或空白名稱。

trans-unit.source: - Not `null` or an empty sample.
trans-unit.target: -不`null`或空的範例。

trans-unit.source: - The sample is correct based on the mask and all required edit characters have been provided.
trans-unit.target: -此範例是正確使用依據遮照，而且已提供所有必要的編輯字元。

trans-unit.source: This means the mask is completed but not necessarily full.
trans-unit.target: 這表示遮罩已完成，但不是一定完整。

trans-unit.source: - The sample is valid based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MaskDescriptor.ValidatingType%2A> object, if any.
trans-unit.target: -此範例是有效根據<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MaskDescriptor.ValidatingType%2A>物件，如果有的話。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MaskDescriptor.ValidatingType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The mask descriptor to test for validity.
trans-unit.target: 要測試有效性的遮罩描述項。

trans-unit.source: if maskDescriptor is valid; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if maskDescriptor is valid; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the specified mask descriptor is valid, and provides an error description if it is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出指定的遮罩描述元是否有效，並提供錯誤描述，如果不是有效。

trans-unit.source: The IsValidMaskDescriptor method determines whether `maskDescriptor` is valid and can be added to the masks list.
trans-unit.target: IsValidMaskDescriptor 方法會判斷是否`maskDescriptor`有效，而且可以新增至遮罩清單。

trans-unit.source: A valid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MaskDescriptor> must meet the following conditions.
trans-unit.target: 有效<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MaskDescriptor>必須符合下列條件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MaskDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: - Not `null`.
trans-unit.target: - Not `null`.

trans-unit.source: - Not `null` or an empty mask.
trans-unit.target: -不`null`或空的遮罩。

trans-unit.source: - Not `null` or an empty name.
trans-unit.target: -不`null`或空白名稱。

trans-unit.source: - Not `null` or an empty sample.
trans-unit.target: -不`null`或空的範例。

trans-unit.source: - The sample is correct based on the mask and all required edit characters have been provided.
trans-unit.target: -此範例是正確使用依據遮照，而且已提供所有必要的編輯字元。

trans-unit.source: This means the mask is completed but not necessarily full.
trans-unit.target: 這表示遮罩已完成，但不是一定完整。

trans-unit.source: - The sample is valid based on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MaskDescriptor.ValidatingType%2A> object, if any.
trans-unit.target: -此範例是有效根據<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MaskDescriptor.ValidatingType%2A>物件，如果有的話。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MaskDescriptor.ValidatingType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The mask descriptor to test for validity.
trans-unit.target: 要測試有效性的遮罩描述項。

trans-unit.source: A string representing a validation error.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示驗證錯誤。

trans-unit.source: If no validation error occurred, the `validationErrorDescription` is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 如果不發生任何驗證錯誤，`validationErrorDescription`為<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: if maskDescriptor is valid; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if maskDescriptor is valid; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Gets the mask being defined.
trans-unit.target: 取得所定義的遮罩。

trans-unit.source: The mask must contain only valid characters, as defined by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IsValidMaskChar%2A> method of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: 遮罩必須只包含有效字元，所定義之<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IsValidMaskChar%2A>方法的<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider>類別。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IsValidMaskChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a predefined mask is selected in [!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)], its Mask property is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 預先定義的遮罩中的選取時[!INCLUDE[vsprvs](~/add/includes/vsprvs-md.md)]，其遮罩 屬性隨即出現。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the mask being defined.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含所定義的遮罩。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the user-friendly name of the mask.
trans-unit.target: 取得遮罩的使用者易記名稱。

trans-unit.source: The Name property is displayed in the **Mask Description** column in the visual editor for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: Name 屬性會顯示在**遮罩描述**視覺編輯器中的資料行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the name or brief description of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MaskDescriptor.Mask*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>包含名稱或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MaskDescriptor.Mask*>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MaskDescriptor.Mask*>的簡短描述</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets a sample of a formatted string for the mask.
trans-unit.target: 取得遮罩格式化字串的範例。

trans-unit.source: The Sample property is displayed in the **Data Format** column in the visual editor for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 範例屬性會顯示在**資料格式**視覺編輯器中的資料行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing text that is formatted by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MaskDescriptor.Mask*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>包含可使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MaskDescriptor.Mask*>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.MaskDescriptor.Mask*>格式化的文字</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the current object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回代表目前物件的字串。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current object.
trans-unit.target: 表示目前物件的字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type providing validation associated with the mask.
trans-unit.target: 取得提供驗證與遮罩相關聯的類型。

trans-unit.source: The ValidatingType property is used to validate the input string after the mask has been applied to it.
trans-unit.target: ValidatingType 屬性用來驗證輸入的字串之後，已套用遮罩。

trans-unit.source: It directly corresponds to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.ValidatingType%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> class.
trans-unit.target: 它會直接對應至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.ValidatingType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.ValidatingType%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> that the formatted string is validated against.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>格式化的字串為驗證依據。</xref:System.Type>
